item.title: [helpful topic] dodian premium. [helpful topic]
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

Ok well i have seen way to many ppl asking how to change the premium on dodian servers well… since this is to short for a [tut] i decided to make a helpful topic post instead… so here it is…

Ok first open client.java…
search Case 20… til u see something similar to this.

} if (server.enforceClient && !officialClient) { println("Invalid client!"); returnCode = 12; disconnected = true; return; } else { switch (playerRights) { case 20: // root admin premium = true; break; case 3: // regular admin premium = true; break; case 2: // global mod premium = true; break; case 1: // player moderator premium = true; break; case 4: // just premium premium = true; break; default: playerRights = 0; premium = true; // false; // break; }
and change the premium = true to false. on the default: and on its your choice if you want the mods and admins auto member when they become a mod/admin. well thats the end of this helpful topic… post replys…
100%- to me.
if u need any help just pm me or post here.

Read full topic
